title: Patient Safety Learning Through Hospital Adverse Event Analysis (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of medical terminology and hospital operational structures
context.additional_context: Large-Scale Group Learning Environment Using Smartphone-Based VR Simulations, Providing Simplified Virtual Scenarios Based on Real Hospital Cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain root causes of adverse events in hospitals by applying at least three analytical frameworks
Learners can record patient safety risk factors identified through VR simulations with 80% accuracy
Learners can propose at least three adverse event prevention strategies through peer feedback sessions

resources: Mobile VR devices (10 sets for group rotation)
Simplified hospital adverse event case database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
